title: Cross
key_application: Receive Christ's sacrifice for your sins
prayer_points: Thank God for Christ's sacrifice on the cross
Pray for those who need to know Christ's love
Ask for strength to take up your cross
Pray for those suffering for their faith

questions.question: What does the cross mean to you personally?
questions.answer: Guide discussion toward personal significance of the cross.

questions.question: How do you understand Jesus' death on the cross?
questions.answer: Explain the theological and personal meaning of the cross.

questions.question: What impact has the cross had on your life?
questions.answer: Discuss the transformative power of the cross in believers' lives.

questions.question: What do we learn about Jesus' suffering from this passage?
questions.answer: The physical and spiritual agony of crucifixion.

questions.question: How does this passage show the meaning of the cross?
questions.answer: As the means of reconciliation between God and humanity.

questions.question: What significance do you see in the centurion's confession?
questions.answer: That even a Gentile recognized Jesus as the Son of God.

questions.question: How does this passage point to Jesus' identity?
questions.answer: As the Son of God who gives His life for others.

questions.question: What does the tearing of the temple curtain signify?
questions.answer: The removal of barriers between God and humanity.

questions.question: How does the cross shape your daily life?
questions.answer: Help apply the cross to daily decisions and relationships.

questions.question: What does it mean to take up your cross and follow Jesus?
questions.answer: Explain the call to sacrificial living and service.

questions.question: How can you live in light of Christ's sacrifice?
questions.answer: Suggest practical ways to live out gratitude for salvation.

questions.question: What specific ways can you demonstrate the power of the cross?
questions.answer: Discuss specific expressions of cross-shaped living.

questions.question: How can you help others understand the meaning of the cross?
questions.answer: Share strategies for explaining the gospel to others.
